description: Cozy two-bedroom apartment located in the heart of Hells Kitchen, a vibrant neighborhood known for its many varied restaurant options. A short walk from Times Square, Broadway shows, and the Fifth Avenue shopping district. The apartment is located off the building's courtyard and is especially quiet.
name: Brand New 2bed APT Discounted price!!
review: The apartment was exactly what we expected! The host communicated instructions very clearly. Great location - close to Times Square, but far enough away that you aren't right in it.
